title: L'enigma della Gioconda - point of view

content.description:
Directions: Read the following selection carefully for comprehension. The selection is followed by a number of questions. For each question, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

This selection was originally published on the Bol Web site in August 2007.
content.question: Secondo il brano, che tipo di persona era Lisa dei Gherardini?

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
